page.title: 08LINN ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND
page.content:
{ {LINN PARK}has an Adventure Playground - with a difference.
It is for mentally and physically{ {HANDICAPPED}children, and so far it is the only one in Scotland.
The playground gives handicapped children the chance to experience through{Adventurous Play}a CHALLENGE which is normally denied them.
When they come to the Playground they meet, probably for the first time,a variety of physical and mental activities at their own speed, and without having to compete against their able-bodied peers.
